name: Whack-O-Sheep
description:
Hey Guys, Whack-O-Sheep is a little game two friends of mine and I created for a small local game jam at my uni. The amazing theme of the Jam was: powerless Sheep

I know - but despite the "interesting" I think my friends and I managed to make a pretty solid game in 3 days. Thank you very much for playing  ;D

Control (standart)

WASD to move

R to reset

Left Click to whack!!!!
